00045 /* newnoise: generic noise & turbulence functions to replace the above BLI_hnoise/p & BLI_turbulence/1.
00046  * This is done so different noise basis functions can be used */
00047 float BLI_gNoise(float noisesize, float x, float y, float z, int hard, int noisebasis);

00055 float mg_RidgedMultiFractal(float x, float y, float z, float H, float lacunarity, float octaves, float offset, float gain, int noisebasis);
00056 /* newnoise: voronoi */
00057 void voronoi(float x, float y, float z, float* da, float* pa, float me, int dtype);
